definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

sentences.english: A laser phase modulation system with acoustooptic modulator is described.
sentences.chinese: 本文敘述了一種包含有聲光調製器的激光調相系統。

sentences.english: Discussion on unit phase modulation pressing water system and test of Tuyen Quang hydroelectric project in …
sentences.chinese: 越南宣光水電站機組壓水調相系統及其試驗淺析。

sentences.english: The demodulation technique of PRCPM fuze signal is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了僞碼調相引信信號的解調技術。
